translation.descHome: Rick Reis' portfolio, a full stack developer with experience in React, TypeScript, Node.js, PHP, and more. See projects, skills, and contact.
translation.resumoDesc1: With experience in professional, academic, and personal projects, my technical skills include HTML/CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Vue.js, Node.js, PHP/Laravel, and SQL. I use agile methodologies, such as Scrum and Kanban, to organize tasks and demands in Azure DevOps.
translation.resumoDesc2: Throughout my professional journey, I contribute to the maintenance and evolution of systems that serve a large number of people, directly impacting the services provided. I highlight my ability to solve problems, learn quickly, and work as part of a team. I value quality and strive to balance it with deadlines, ensuring the best possible results.
translation.sobreDesc: I consider myself a problem-solver and a fast learner who is constantly seeking to improve.
translation.sobreDesc2: With advanced English and degree in Systems Analysis and Development, I have accumulated knowledge and experience in development, with solid skills in React, HTML/CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, Sass, Node.js and SQL, along with relevant knowledge in PHP, Docker, REST API, Flutter, Bootstrap, and other technologies.
translation.boxExperienciaFairyDesc: With a focus on frontend, I worked on diverse projects with different business rules, using generative AI tools and intelligent IDEs like Cursor on a daily basis to optimize development. I contribute with solutions focused on user experience, system integration, and interface architecture in a dynamic and innovative environment.
translation.boxExperienciaConectaDesc: I contributed to the maintenance and evolution of systems used by hundreds of internal users and external clients, helping to sustain and improve processes that directly impacted the company's operational activities and the quality of the services provided. I used PHP/Laravel, Vue.js, MySQL, and log analysis for troubleshooting, combining these with the Scrum methodology and tools like Azure DevOps and Git, along with AI tools to achieve the best possible results.
translation.boxExperienciaFatecDesc: Working with React, Node.js, SCSS, Figma, Auth0, and Notion, I contributed to both Back-end and Front-end development and participated in planning an initial system base version for a service portal aimed at centralizing requests related to the college's coordination.
translation.educacaoCursoFatec: Technologist Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
translation.educacaoNomeFatec: São Paulo State Faculty of Technology - Fatec Ribeirão Preto
translation.projetosBtnTitle: See all the projects on GitHub
translation.boxProjetos-JapaCasa-Desc: A delivery website for a Japanese food restaurant, where users can view the menu and add items to the cart.
translation.boxProjetos-Estudantes-Desc: A simple system that allows adding, listing, editing, and deleting student information.
translation.boxProjetos-EventosBR-Desc: A website for event registration and discovery with a modern design. Developed as a study in the use of AI tools such as Lovable and Cursor.
translation.boxProjetos-BudgetControl-Desc: A modern web application for personal expense tracking. Developed as a study in the use of AI tools such as Lovable.
translation.boxProjetos-PortalServicos-Desc: A modular web system that manages and provides services for a public college.
translation.boxProjetos-ContactMVC-Desc: A web application that implements CRUD operations in a contact system linked to a database in Docker.
translation.boxProjetos-Epp-Desc: An Android app designed to help with programming learning using gamification.
translation.boxProjetos-Pagamento-Desc: A payment page with form validations and a mobile-first design.
translation.boxProjetos-GerSenhas-Desc: A web application that allows the registration, generation, and management of passwords, notes, and favorites.
translation.boxProjetos-Tarefas-Desc: A page that displays a task list, allowing users to add tasks and mark them as completed.
translation.boxProjetos-IMC-Desc: A website that calculates the body mass index (BMI) and returns the weight range it falls into.
translation.contatoDesc: I would love to discuss how I can contribute to your company's success or help transform your idea into a beautiful and efficient solution. Shall we talk? Get in touch with me and let's make it happen! Feedback is always welcome too.
